verbs.description: [ARG0: some blacks] [V: see] [ARG1: a racial double standard] [ARGM-LOC: in kavanaugh case] marcus dixon was sentenced to 10 years behind bars in georgia for having sex with an underage white girl when he was 18 dayonn davis another black youth got a five - year prison sentence for stealing a 100 pair of shoes at gunpoint when he was 15 it cases like those that minorities and others point to with frustration when they hear some of brett kavanaugh defenders say the sexual assault and underage - drinking accusations against the supreme court nominee fall under the category of boys will be boys toure deepti hajela statutory rape twitter washington supreme court ap dayonn davis howard county council cleveland jarvis deberry jholland ap org rape brett kavanaugh trayvon martin christine blasey ford michael brown minnesota the associated press new york sen scott newman kavanaugh new york times georgetown university law center maryland penn state university editor jesse j holland reporter american psychological association bari weiss assistant professor harrisburg assault facebook ferguson eileen m ahlen msnbc georgia officer missouri tamir rice eileen m ahlen opel jones marcus dixon
